reviewText: My kids and I enjoyed this show except for the toxic fumigation seen being done to the soil and also the GMO corn slathered with chemicals, unrecognizable as corn. But more importantly, the message was clear, God's kingdom is like a mustard seed ....

whacky, nerdy, out of date video posesses a fresh, timeless, infectious, allegorical message of the simple truth of God and His creation. As a gardener I'm frequently struck by the way gardening is a metaphor for life, and the goofy farmer in the film takes you on a lovely tour of the fruitfulness found in understanding God's love.
